# Halo2 Framework

ref: https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explorations/halo2-solidity-verifier

Simulation using rust:

```
Verifier creation code size: 3605
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^10 rows: 304700
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^11 rows: 304741
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^12 rows: 304782
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^13 rows: 304835
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^14 rows: 304912
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^15 rows: 305025
Gas cost of verifying standard Plonk with 2^16 rows: 305042
```

## **Modification code**

[](./halo2/patch.diff)

## **plonk 16 public signals**

**code**

For 2\^16

- [Verifier.sol](./plonk_16/verfier.sol)
- [VerifyingKey.sol](./plonk_16/verifiyingKey.sol)

**vk:**

```
0x2AC69976f639862d4A11e989dD451434613FfF3B
```

**NOTE: change the vk to deployed vk contract**

